person.persName: John McWilliams Bone (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary A. Bone. Father of Winfield Bone, Samuel J. Bone, William Bone, Sarah C. Bone, Mark Bone, and Wilson Bone. Married to Elizabeth Bone. Father of Lysander Bone and Bettie Bone. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned eleven enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1860. Owned fifteen enslaved persons in Hopkins County in 1860.
